text: The Art Building and Annex (or Art Annex) are buildings on the Portland State University campus in Portland, Oregon, United States. The Annex underwent a renovation in 2009. Both buildings have been considered for demolition.https://psuvanguard.com/psu-seeks-state-funding-for-two-new- buildings/ ==See also== * List of Portland State University buildings ==References== Category:Portland State University buildings
title: Art Building and Annex
